MedalTierMetadata.Description: Support medals are awarded for being a good team player.
MedalTierMetadata.Name: Support

MedalTierMetadata.Description: Earn these medals by killing your opponents with the various weapons at your disposal.
MedalTierMetadata.Name: Kill

MedalTierMetadata.Description: Easy to earn, collect them by the dozen.
MedalTierMetadata.Name: Bronze

MedalTierMetadata.Description: Not as easy to get, but they help you get a better score.
MedalTierMetadata.Name: Silver

MedalTierMetadata.Description: High value medals, difficult to earn.
MedalTierMetadata.Name: Gold

MedalTierMetadata.Description: Top tier medals, very difficult to earn.
MedalTierMetadata.Name: Platinum

MedalTierMetadata.Description: These are legendary medals, each one is a rare trophy for your collection.
MedalTierMetadata.Name: Onyx

MedalMetadata.Description: Wipe out an enemy team with at least an Overkill.
MedalMetadata.Name: Extermination

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 2 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Double Kill

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 3 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Triple Kill

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 4 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Overkill

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 5 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killtacular

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 6 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killtrocity

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 7 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killamanjaro

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 8 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killtastrophe

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 9 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killpocalypse

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 10 opponents within 4.5 seconds of one another.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killionaire

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 5 opponents without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killing Spree

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 10 opponents without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killing Frenzy

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 15 opponents without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Running Riot

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 20 opponents without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Rampage

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 25 opponents without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Untouchable

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 30 opponents without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Invincible

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 35 opponents without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Inconceivable

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill 40 opponents without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Unfriggenbelievable

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent who is lunging with a sword.
MedalMetadata.Name: Bulltrue

MedalMetadata.Description: Hit and kill an opponent with your vehicle.
MedalMetadata.Name: Splatter

MedalMetadata.Description: Board a land-based vehicle by forcibly removing the opponent in it.
MedalMetadata.Name: Hijack

MedalMetadata.Description: Board an aircraft by forcibly removing the opponent in it.
MedalMetadata.Name: Skyjack

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent after you die.
MedalMetadata.Name: Kill From the Grave

MedalMetadata.Description: End an opponent's killing spree.
MedalMetadata.Name: Killjoy

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent with a SPARTAN Laser.
MedalMetadata.Name: Splaser Kill

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent with a Sniper Rifle.
MedalMetadata.Name: Sniper Rifle Kill

MedalMetadata.Description: Hit and kill an opponent with a melee attack from behind.
MedalMetadata.Name: Beat Down

MedalMetadata.Description: Hit and kill an opponent with a melee attack.
MedalMetadata.Name: Melee

MedalMetadata.Description: Destroy an opponents vehicle, killing the driver.
MedalMetadata.Name: Vehicle Destroyed

MedalMetadata.Description: Drive a vehicle and have a passenger kill an opponent.
MedalMetadata.Name: Wheelman

MedalMetadata.Description: Deliver the opponent's flag to your base.
MedalMetadata.Name: Flag Capture

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent while holding a flag.
MedalMetadata.Name: Flag Kill

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent who is carrying a flag.
MedalMetadata.Name: Flag Carrier Kill

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent with a headshot.
MedalMetadata.Name: Headshot

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent with a needle supercombination.
MedalMetadata.Name: Supercombine

MedalMetadata.Description: EMP an opponent who is then killed.
MedalMetadata.Name: EMP Assist

MedalMetadata.Description: Assist a player in achieving a kill.
MedalMetadata.Name: Assist

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill the opponent responsible for your last death.
MedalMetadata.Name: Revenge

MedalMetadata.Description: Earn the first kill of the match.
MedalMetadata.Name: First Strike

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill a sprinting opponent with a headshot.
MedalMetadata.Name: Headcase

MedalMetadata.Description: Stop an assassination by killing the assassinating opponent.
MedalMetadata.Name: Showstopper

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent who recently killed your teammate.
MedalMetadata.Name: Avenger

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent by performing an assassination.
MedalMetadata.Name: Assassination

MedalMetadata.Description: Generic Kill.
MedalMetadata.Name: Kill

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent with an Energy Sword.
MedalMetadata.Name: Sword Kill

MedalMetadata.Name: Regicide

MedalMetadata.Description: Assassinate the King.
MedalMetadata.Name: Execution

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent with a vehicle weapon.
MedalMetadata.Name: Vehicle Kill

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent who stole your ordnance.
MedalMetadata.Name: Vengeance

MedalMetadata.Description: Distract an opponent who is then killed.
MedalMetadata.Name: Distraction

MedalMetadata.Description: Earn the final Kill.
MedalMetadata.Name: Last Strike

MedalMetadata.Description: Assist a player in destroying a vehicle.
MedalMetadata.Name: Vehicle Destroy Assist

MedalMetadata.Description: Load up a Warthog with 2 teammates and go for a drive.
MedalMetadata.Name: Road Trip

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill an opponent by performing a midair assassination.
MedalMetadata.Name: Airsassination

MedalMetadata.Description: Achieve a kill after dying 3 times in a row.

MedalMetadata.Name: Kingtacular

MedalMetadata.Name: Reign of Terror

MedalMetadata.Description: Kill the King 3 times in a row.

MedalMetadata.Name: Arm Assist

MedalMetadata.Description: Get the Final Kill in Last Stand Mode.
MedalMetadata.Name: Kill Shot!

MedalMetadata.Description: Instigate a successful capture that saves the team from Last Stand.
MedalMetadata.Name: Hero!

MedalMetadata.Description: Survive Last Stand without dying.
MedalMetadata.Name: Survivor

MedalMetadata.Description: Be within a base when it is captured.
MedalMetadata.Name: Capture Assist

MedalMetadata.Description: Assist a teammate in initiating a base capture.
MedalMetadata.Name: Capture Initiation Assist

MedalMetadata.Description: Be within a base your team controls when it fortifies.
